name: Escargot Kart
description: Creatively rocket, jump and parachute your way across dozens of virtual physics playgrounds while performing aerial acrobatics in Escargot Kart, the original rolling platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics processor with 512 MB of RAM. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 290 MB available space
